entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.3°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %

Dewpoint: -16.2°C

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Monday 27 March 2023
